narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Louisiana Health & Rehabilitation Coptions is a Psychologist, Intellectual & Developmental Disabilities provider based in Lafayette, LA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $23.8M in Medicaid payments across 157K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $23.8M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
